name: MariaDB
description: Records all operations in the order in which they are committed to the database.

name: MongoDB
description: Capture changes from a MongoDB database in real-time.

name: MySQL
description: Stream changes from a MySQL database to other systems.

name: Oracle
description: Captures and records row-level changes that occur in databases on an Oracle server.

name: PostgreSQL
description: Monitor and capture changes from a PostgreSQL database.

name: SQL Server
description: Stream change events from a Microsoft SQL Server database.
